name: Sung Jinwoo
description: Once known as the E-Rank Hunter, Sung Jinwoo was chosen by the System to become a Player, eventually inheriting the full powers of the Shadow Monarch Ashborn.
notes: The second Shadow Monarch and the strongest Hunter.

name: Cha Hae-In
description: South Korea's only female S-Rank Hunter and the Vice-Guild Master of the Hunters Guild. She has a unique ability to smell mana.

name: Igris
description: A powerful knightly figure encountered by Sung Jinwoo in an S-Rank instant dungeon. After being defeated, he becomes one of Jinwoo's most loyal and formidable shadow soldiers.
notes: One of the first humanoid shadows Jinwoo extracts that can speak.
firstAppearance: Chapter 40 (Manhwa - as enemy), Chapter 45 (Manhwa - as shadow)

name: Beru
description: The monstrously powerful Ant King from the Jeju Island S-Rank Gate. After his defeat by Sung Jinwoo, Beru is extracted as a shadow and becomes an incredibly strong and fiercely loyal commander in the shadow army.
rank: Marshal Grade (initially National Level Hunter equivalent)
notes: Obsessively loyal to Sung Jinwoo and enjoys reading.
firstAppearance: Chapter 90 (Manhwa - as enemy), Chapter 107 (Manhwa - as shadow)

name: Kamish
description: An S-Rank magic beast (dragon) that emerged from the first S-Rank Gate in the USA. It took multiple National Level Hunters to bring him down. Sung Jinwoo later attempted to extract his shadow.
notes: Shadow extraction by Jinwoo failed due to too much time having passed since its death.
firstAppearance: Mentioned early, seen in flashback/records (e.g. Chapter 133 Manhwa)
